content.text:
Let me analyze the target structure and provide a detailed solution.

Analysis of Main Target Image:
The structure consists of two separate constructions:

1. Left Structure:
- Has multiple layers with red, orange, and yellow blocks
- Contains cylindrical pillars, a red block with a hole, yellow rectangular supports
- Topped with an orange triangular block

2. Right Structure:
- Made of green vertical pieces forming a frame
- Has yellow rectangular supports
- Contains an orange triangular block
- Supported by an orange cylindrical pillar
- Has a green base

Block Count and Layer Analysis:
Total blocks needed: approximately 13-14 blocks
Multiple layers with careful stacking required

Assembly Instructions:
For the left structure:
{
Step1: Move block with index 10 (bottom yellow support)
Step2: Move block with index 2 (red block with hole)
Step3: Move block with index 10 (middle yellow support)
Step4: Move block with index 11 (left orange pillar)
Step5: Move block with index 11 (right orange pillar)
Step6: Move block with index 10 (top yellow support)
Step7: Move block with index 16 (orange triangle on top)
}

For the right structure:
{
Step8: Move block with index 5 (green base)
Step9: Move block with index 11 (orange pillar)
Step10: Move block with index 6 (left green vertical)
Step11: Move block with index 7 (right green vertical)
Step12: Move block with index 10 (yellow top support)
Step13: Move block with index 16 (orange triangle)
}

The blocks have been selected to match the exact orientations shown in the dictionary, with no rotations applied. The assembly order follows a bottom-up approach for stability.
